# Guide

The max retry count is [`MAX_RETRIES`](../src/app.py#MAX_RETRIES).

The [`process`](../src/app.py#process) function cleans input.

The [`Config`](../src/app.py#Config) class holds settings.

The [`Config.host`](../src/app.py#Config.host) attribute stores the hostname.

The [`Config.validate`](../src/app.py#Config.validate) method checks validity.

The [`Config.address`](../src/app.py#Config.address) property formats the address.
